mapper.select: SELECT a.activite_id, a.nom as activiteNom, a.app_id, a.type_id FROM activite as a JOIN app as ap on a.app_id = ap.app_id JOIN session_app as sa ON sa.app_id = ap.app_id JOIN session as s on s.session_id = sa.session_id JOIN app_usager as au ON au.app_id = ap.app_id WHERE s.periode @> CURRENT_DATE AND au.cip = #{cip} ORDER BY activiteNom, a.type_id;

SELECT activite.activite_id as activiteId, activite.local, activite.nom as activiteNom,lower(activite.periode) as debut, upper(activite.periode) as fin, app.app_id as appId, app.nom as appNom, app.cours as appCours, type_activite.type_id as typeId, type_activite.nom as typeNom FROM activite INNER JOIN type_activite ON type_activite.type_id = activite.type_id INNER JOIN app ON app.app_id = activite.app_id INNER JOIN app_usager ON app_usager.app_id = activite.app_id JOIN session_app as sa ON sa.app_id = app.app_id JOIN session as s on s.session_id = sa.session_id WHERE app.app_id = #{appID} AND type_activite.type_id = #{typeID} AND app_usager.cip = #{cip} AND s.periode @> CURRENT_DATE ORDER BY activiteNom,activite.periode ASC;

SELECT app_usager.cip as cip, usager_preference.preference_id as preferenceapp, usager.preference_id as preferenceglobal, usager_preference.intendant as intendant FROM app_usager LEFT JOIN usager_preference ON usager_preference.cip = app_usager.cip INNER JOIN usager ON usager.cip = app_usager.cip INNER JOIN session_app as sa ON sa.app_id = app_usager.app_id INNER JOIN session as s on s.session_id = sa.session_id WHERE app_usager.app_id = #{appID} AND (usager_preference.app_id is null OR usager_preference.app_id = #{appID}) AND s.periode @> CURRENT_DATE;
SELECT preference.preference_id as preferenceId, preference.nom, preference.debut, preference.fin FROM preference;
SELECT activite.nom as activiteNom, activite.activite_id as activiteId, activite.type_id as typeId FROM activite
mapper.update: UPDATE session_app as sa SET inscription =true Where (select session_id FROM session WHERE periode@> CURRENT_DATE) =sa.session_id AND sa.app_id=#{appID}
